import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from '../styles/CigarForm.module.css' import inputStyle from '../styles/InputStyles.module.css' import axios from 'axios' const CigarForm = (props) => { const { cigarList, setCigarList, initialName, initial } = props const [ brand, setBrand ] = useState('') const [ name, setName ] = useState('') const [ description, setDescription ] = useState('') const [ image, setImage ] = useState('') const [ rating, setRating ] = useState('') return (
setBrand(e.target.value)} value={brand} name='brand' type='text' />
setName(e.target.value)} value={name} name='name' type='text' />
